remarks: Extend ~ dia2dim to partial isomorphism B. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dib2dim.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dib2dim.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dib2dim.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dib2dim.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dib2dim.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib2dim.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dib2dim.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib2dim.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dib2dim.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ P .<_ W ) ) $.
dib2dim.q $e |- ( ph -> ( Q e. A /\ Q .<_ W ) ) $.
dib2dim $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) C_ ( ( I ` P ) .(+) ( I ` Q ) ) ) $.
